visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The x-axis should have categories 'Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May' and the y-axis should be logarithmic with a minimum value of 0. The data series should include one series named 'Sales' with data [1000, 1500, 1200, 1800, 2000]. The chart should have custom colors ['#008000', '#FFA500', '#FF0000'] and additional configurations such as a white background, a legend positioned at the bottom, and margins set to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart titled 'Monthly Sales Data'. The x-axis is labeled with months from January to May, and the y-axis is logarithmic with a minimum value of 0. The chart includes one data series named 'Sales' with values [1000, 1500, 1200, 1800, 2000]. The chart uses custom colors ['#008000', '#FFA500', '#FF0000'] and has a white background with margins set to 50 pixels on all sides. The legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally.
